doc:
Stacy Edwards https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stacy_Edwards 0 Stacy Edwards (born March 4, 1965) is an American actress. She appeared in a number of B movies before her breakthrough role in the 1997 black comedy film In the Company of Men, for which she received Independent Spirit Award for Best Female Lead nomination. Edwards later had roles in films such as Primary Colors (1998), Black and White (1999) and Driven (2001), and was regular cast member in the CBS medical drama series, Chicago Hope (1997–1999). Stacy_Edwards ( born March_4_,_1965 ) is an_American_actress . She appeared in a_number of B_movies before her_breakthrough_role in the_1997_black_comedy_film In the_Company of Men , for which she received Independent_Spirit_Award for Best_Female_Lead_nomination . Edwards later had roles in films such_as Primary_Colors ( 1998_)_,_Black_and_White_(_1999_)_and_Driven_(_2001_) , and was regular_cast_member in the_CBS_medical_drama_series , Chicago_Hope_(_1997 – 1999_) .
